content: <1>{{displayName}}</1> invites you to join the {{productName}} <1>{{spaceAddress}}</1> for secure document collaboration.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a welcome message when an invitation is sent to join a secure document collaboration space. It includes placeholders for the user's name and the product name, making it adaptable to different users and products. The text appears in a greeting component after a successful file upload or invitation creation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation maintains the HTML tags <1> and </1> which are unnecessary and disrupt the natural flow of the text. They should be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the <1> and </1> tags from the Arabic translation. The translated text should read: "{{displayName}} يدعوك للانضمام الى {{productName}} {{spaceAddress}} للتعاون الآمن في المستندات."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'təhlükəsiz' is a slightly awkward translation of 'secure.' While technically correct, it could be improved.
The sentence structure 'sizi qoşulmağa dəvət edir' is grammatically correct but could be more natural. The placement of 'sizi' feels a bit clunky.

The phrase "安全なドキュメント共同作業をするように" (anzennna dokyumento kyoudou sagyousuru youni) translates more literally to "so that you can do secure document collaboration" which isn't the most natural way to express an invitation.  A more natural phrasing would be something like "安全なドキュメント共同作業のために" (anzennna dokyumento kyoudou sagyousaku no tame ni) which means "for secure document collaboration".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 安全なドキュメント共同作業のためにあなたを{{productName}} <1>{{spaceAddress}}</1>に招待しています。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "invites you to join" is translated as "초대했습니다 (invited)". While technically correct, it loses the active invitation feel of the English. A more accurate translation might be something like "초대합니다 (invites)" or "초대하고 싶습니다 (would like to invite)".
The Laotian translation retains the <1> and </1> tags, which are unnecessary and should be removed. These tags appear to be remnants of the original English formatting and don't have meaning in Lao.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the <1> and </1> tags from the Laotian translation: '{{displayName}} ຂໍເຊີນທ່ານເຂົ້າຮ່ວມ {{productName}} {{spaceAddress}} ເພື່ອການຮ່ວມມືເອກະສານຢ່າງປອດໄພ.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'asociați' (associate) doesn't quite convey the meaning of 'join' in this context. It implies joining a group or organization, while 'join' here means access/participate in a collaboration space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'să vă alăturați' or 'să accesați' instead of 'să vă alăturați'. 'Să vă alăturați' is closer, but 'să accesați' might be more accurate depending on the exact intent.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ආරාධනා කර ඇත" (aaradanaa karaa geta) translates to 'has invited'. A more natural and active voice in Sinhala would be something like 'ආරාධනා කරයි' (aaradanaa karai), meaning 'invites'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <1>{{displayName}}</1> ඔබට ආරක්‍ෂිතව සහයෝගයෙන් ලේඛන වල වැඩ කිරීමට <1>{{spaceAddress}}</1> {{productName}} වෙත ආරාධනා කරයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'සහයෝගයෙන්' (sahayōgayen) is a somewhat formal way to say 'with collaboration'. Consider alternatives depending on the target audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <1>{{displayName}}</1> ඔබට ආරක්‍ෂිතව දෙසැවිරැල්ලේ ලේඛන වල වැඩ කිරීමට <1>{{spaceAddress}}</1> {{productName}} වෙත ආරාධනා කරයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'приступите' (priступите) doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of 'join' in this context. A more natural translation would be something along the lines of 'уђите у' (uђите у) or 'придружите се' (pridruжite se).

The Cyrillic text uses '{{productName}}-у'. While understandable, the hyphen is unnecessary and can be improved for readability. The possessive suffix '-у' is technically correct but stylistically less common with product names in this context.
The Serbian translation uses a hyphen to connect 'productName' which might not be the desired formatting. It's possible the product name should remain separate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider whether 'productName' should be presented as 'productName' instead of 'productName-u'.
